sentences.en: Add tomato paste, salt and pepper to taste.
sentences.cn: 酌量添加番茄酱、盐和胡椒粉。

sentences.en: He put some pepper in the bowl.
sentences.cn: 他放了一些胡椒粉在碗里.

sentences.en: I can eat red pepper, though I'm not overfond of it.
sentences.cn: 辣椒我吃得来, 但不特别喜欢.

sentences.en: I order black pepper sirloin without any paprika.
sentences.cn: 我叫的是黑椒牛腰肉,不要放红椒.

sentences.en: Roll the meat in coarsely ground black pepper to season it.
sentences.cn: 将肉在粗研的黑胡椒粉里滚一下以调味。

sentences.en: Season lightly with salt and pepper.
sentences.cn: 略微加点盐和胡椒调味。

sentences.en: Season the meat with salt and pepper.
sentences.cn: 用盐和胡椒粉给肉调味。

sentences.en: Season the steaks generously with salt and pepper.
sentences.cn: 给牛排多加些盐和胡椒调味。

sentences.en: Season with salt, pepper and a pinch of cayenne.
sentences.cn: 调以盐、胡椒和少许辣椒粉。

sentences.en: She sprinkled pepper on my grub, watching me nosh.
sentences.cn: 她在我的食物上撒了点胡椒粉，看着我吃。

sentences.en: The officers blasted him with pepper spray.
sentences.cn: 警察用胡椒粉喷雾剂喷他。

sentences.en: The smell of red pepper being fried irritates the nose.
